item.title: On Reading Code
item.description: On Reading Code # “If you don’t have time to read, you don’t have the time or the tools to write.” –Stephen King Quite a while ago GeeCon published the video taped talk of Kevlin Henney on "Cool Code". This keynote is great to watch for everyone who loves to read code - not the one you encounter in real world enterprise systems - but the one that truely teaches you lessons:
